definitions.definition: a hydroxy - amine , HO.CH 2 .CH 2 .NH 2 , manufactured by the reaction of ethylene oxide with ammonia ; it is found naturally in a combined form in cephalin , and has many industrial applications

main_definition: ( chemistry ) a hydroxy - amine , HO.CH 2 .CH 2 .NH 2 , manufactured by the reaction of ethylene oxide with ammonia ; it is found naturally in a combined form in cephalin , and has many industrial applications
